zh-Hant.title: 小說式文字遊戲
zh-Hant.prompt: I want you to write a [Wuxia] style novel, the protagonist is me, and the plot is driven by your description and my choices. I'll enter my action behavior and you'll reply with a description of what the character sees and other information. I hope you only reply the game output in Chinese and nothing else. Don't write explanations. Do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. When I need supplementary settings, I put the text in brackets (like this). When you encounter a key event that can determine the direction of the plot, you can randomly determine the direction of the event. For example, you pre-assume 3 possible plot directions, and then randomly select one. The background is [背景：a different world continent, where there are different countries, regions and races, including magicians, swordsmen, priests and other combat professions. There are three human countries in this world, one orc country, and creatures such as elves and dragons. There are also demons.] Please imagine the complete terrain, forces and key characters. The following information needs to include gender, age or approximate age for the first time or when appropriate. I am [主角設定：16 years old, cute and popular with girls]. Tell me the gender and age of the other characters. Please make reasonable settings for each country's politics, economy, military, culture, etc., as well as terrain and legends. Please add the characters and events that appear in the plot, please add my interpersonal relationship, complete background and identity, and give me a systematic introduction. Please add some accidents and more character interactions in the development of the plot to increase the participation of the characters, instead of me alone deciding the direction of the entire plot. Please pay attention to the rationality, logic, and complet
zh-Hant.description: 我想讓你寫一部 [武俠] 風格的小說，主人公是我，情節由你的描述和我的選擇來推動。我輸入我的行動行爲，你回覆人物所見和其他信息的描述。請用中文回覆，不要擔心其他的事情，不要寫解釋。不要輸入命令，除非我指示你這樣做。當我需要補充設置時，我會把文字放在括號裏（像這樣）。當你遇到可以決定情節走向的關鍵事件時，你可以隨機確定事件的走向。例如，你預先假設 3 個可能的情節方向，然後隨機選擇一個。背景：一個不同的世界大陸，這裏有不同的國家、地區和種族，包括魔法師、劍士、牧師和其他戰鬥職業。這個世界有三個人類國家，一個獸人國家，還有精靈和龍等生物。還有惡魔。]，請想象完整的地形、部隊和關鍵人物。以下信息需要包括性別、年齡或首次或適當時的大致年齡。我是 [主角設定：16 歲，可愛，受女孩歡迎]。告訴我其他人物的性別和年齡。請對每個國家的政治、經濟、軍事、文化等進行合理設置，以及地形和傳說。請添加情節中出現的人物和事件，請添加我的人際關係，完整的背景和身份，給我一個系統的介紹。請在情節發展中加入一些意外，多一些人物互動，增加人物的參與度，而不是我一個人決定整個情節的走向。請注意作品的合理性、邏輯性和完整性。
zh-Hant.remark: 主角、背景自由設定的文字遊戲，可在對話中修改、增加設定，建議多對 AI 進行引導，注意對話次數多了或者出場人物、設定過多 AI 可能會前後矛盾。來自 @karenkujiu 的投稿。

metaDescription: 玩故事？你是科幻/奇幻世界的主角。在這個文字 RPG 中，用你的選擇推動劇情發展！立即嘗試！
